description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Relativity is a god-type strategy/action game, set in a universe which obeys Einstein’s theories of relativity. DON'T PANIC! While Relativity uses some crazy physics concepts you don't need to understand them to play the game. Hopefully some physics will rub off as you are playing and you can impress* your friends in the pub with phrases like "time dilation". *Actual level of impressed may vary
